member.name: M:phase3_api2.Ui.Controllers.ProdController.GetAllProdInfo
member.summary: Get a list of all information stored.

member.name: M:phase3_api2.Ui.Controllers.ProdController.addProdEntryStore(phase3_api2.Domain.DTO.CreateProdDto)
member.summary: Add a new entry about a product being stored, must have a name and expiry date.
member.remarks: Response contain information of the entry stored, NOTE: id might be useful for locating this entry later.

member.name: M:phase3_api2.Ui.Controllers.ProdController.addProdEntryTake(phase3_api2.Domain.DTO.TakeProdDto)
member.summary: Add information about the removal of a product stored (located with Id), must state if it was wasted.
